meanings.definition: Theobromines: alkaloids found in cacao plants.
meanings.sent1: Cacao plants contain theobromines that give chocolate its flavor.
meanings.sent2: Many people enjoy the taste of chocolate, which contains theobromines.
meanings.sent3: The cacao plant whispered to the theobromines, 'You make me so delicious!'
meanings.sent4: The theobromines in cacao plants are like secret flavor agents.
meanings.sent5: Imagine the theobromines in cacao plants as tiny flavor magicians.

meanings.definition: Theobromines: compounds that have a stimulant effect on the central nervous system.
meanings.sent1: Some people feel more awake after consuming theobromines.
meanings.sent2: The central nervous system can be affected by theobromines in various ways.
meanings.sent3: The theobromines in the brain threw a party, making everyone feel alert and happy.
meanings.sent4: The theobromines acted like little cheerleaders for the nervous system.
meanings.sent5: Picture the theobromines as tiny energizing dancers in your brain.
